View Javadoc
1   package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse.xml;
2   
3   import java.util.ArrayList;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   /**
7    * A class representing the profiles XML element in the Eclipse formatter config
8    * file, including a List of profile settings.
9    *
10   * @author Matt Blanchette
11   */
12  public class Profiles {
13  	public static final String PROFILE_KIND = "CodeFormatterProfile";
14  
15  	private final List<Profile> profiles = new ArrayList<>();
16  
17  	public void addProfile(Profile profile) {
18  		if (PROFILE_KIND.equals(profile.getKind())) {
19  			profiles.add(profile);
20  		}
21  	}
22  
23  	public List<Profile> getProfiles() {
24  		return profiles;
25  	}
26  }
